original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-05 16:04:35' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 04:35:36' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=1 AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 20:01:58' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-13 17:29:23' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-04 08:54:56' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0 AND (CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-05 16:04:35' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 04:35:36')
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-04 08:54:56'

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 1 AND (CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 20:01:58' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-13 17:29:23')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3.UserId=E2.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3E2.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E2E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E2E4.UserId)
